job_tasks.phrase: focusing on ensuring the scalability and reliability of the systems we've built around and integrated with our LLM (Large Language Models) infrastructure and traditional AI models.
job_tasks.justification: This phrase describes building and maintaining software systems, ensuring they are scalable and reliable, which aligns with the definition of Software Development.

job_tasks.phrase: ensuring the scalability and reliability of the systems we've built around and integrated with our LLM (Large Language Models) infrastructure and traditional AI models.
job_tasks.justification: Ensuring scalability and reliability of infrastructure, especially around LLM and AI models, falls under operations engineering (MLOps).

classification.rationale: The job description focuses on backend engineering, scalability, and reliability of existing LLM and AI infrastructure. It lacks specific core responsibilities related to building, fine-tuning, or developing applications directly with generative AI models, leaning more towards operational aspects of existing AI systems.
